traceability.evidence: Search of the CLI entry point (bin/dry-aged-deps.js) and core logic (src/print-outdated.js) shows no handling of `--update` or `--yes` flags, no code to read, write, or backup package.json, no interactive confirmation flow, and no summary report or install prompt. A search for tests referencing update behavior in the test/ directory returns zero results.
traceability.notes: The specification for auto‐updating package.json is present in prompts/011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE.md but none of the acceptance criteria (update flag, safe‐only updates, format preservation, confirmation, backup, summary, prompts, or error handling) are implemented or covered by tests.
